page.title: 07SHOPPING
page.content: The last 30 years have seen a revolution in shopping habits-supermarkets,pedestrian precincts and take-away food shops have dramatically changed the look of the local shopping centres {The Moor}is a typical pedestrian precinct. No vehicles are allowed in the area. Instead, there is a paved walk-way with seats, shrubbery and a band-stand. Here shoppers can, if they wish dawdle, chat and listen to street buskers with no stress from heavy traffic. For those with money to spare there is {Ecclesall Road,}with its chic clothes shops, foreign restaurants and health food shops.
